story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1101_0100_20: The night before the Arceus Cup...
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_0200_10: Here! I made you a super nutritious sandwich!
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Eat up for your big challenge!
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_0500_10: I’ll share it with my Pokémon later.
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_0800_10: I’m sure Arceus’ll acknowledge your bond!
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_1000_10:
We’ll keep your words in mind as we battle
tomorrow.
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_1100_10:
You’ll be fine! And if you still haven’t had enough
after you beat Iris...
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: Hilda... You just always wanna battle, don’t you.
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_1800_10:
No one is as kind to Pokémon as you are.
I know that more than anyone!
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I’ve known ever since you took care of Genesect
back at the Team Plasma hideout!
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_2100_10:
You don’t have to change yourself one bit.
Just show Arceus who you are!
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_2500_10: ...We did team up once, after all.
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_2700_10:
You’re participating to prove your bond with your
Pokémon, right?
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Honestly, I’m worried I may not be able to attain
an arc suit...
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_3000_10: Tch. Don’t go soft on me now.
story_arceus_03_04000/2401_1001_3100_10:
You treat your Pokémon like family. They’re way
more important to you than that guy who calls
himself your “father.”
